title: How to Make Wholemeal Health Muffins

steps.headline: Assemble all the ingredients.
steps.description: Mash the bananas in a bowl. Add milk, honey, oil and vanilla.

steps.headline: In another bowl, mix the whole wheat flour, oats, baking powder, baking soda, dried fruit and nutmeg
Beat the eggs and add them to the banana mixture.
Now carefully fold the banana mixture in the flour mixture making sure there are no lumps formed.
steps.description: You can add some more milk if the batter is too thick

steps.headline: Now spoon the batter in greased muffin cups and bake for 20 - 25 minutes in a preheated oven or until done.

text: Assemble all the ingredients. Mash the bananas in a bowl. Add milk, honey, oil and vanilla. In another bowl, mix the whole wheat flour, oats, baking powder, baking soda, dried fruit and nutmeg  Beat the eggs and add them to the banana mixture.  Now carefully fold the banana mixture in the flour mixture making sure there are no lumps formed. You can add some more milk if the batter is too thick Now spoon the batter in greased muffin cups and bake for 20 - 25 minutes in a preheated oven or until done.  Drizzle with honey and serve.
